document_data.name: Gould Wyvernspur
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Gould Wyvernspur''' was a member of the noble [[House Wyvernspur]] of [[Cormyr]] who lived in the late 10{{th}} and early 11{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
document_data.History: Gould Wyvernspur was born in the {{YearlinkName|956}} to [[Paton Wyvernspur]] and [[Jasanna Larkspar]]. Gould's only sibling was his sister [[Andra Wyvernspur]]. Later in life, he wed [[Amalee Winter]] and fathered two children. The older son, Lord [[Gerrin Wyvernspur]], was born in {{YearlinkName|980}} Gould's and Amalee's younger son was [[Finder Wyvernspur]] who would eventually become a renowned [[bard]], one of the founding members of the [[Harpers]], and eventually, a [[deity]].{{Cite polyhedron/119/Forgotten Deities: Finder Wyvernspur|23}}
